turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a coffee from the Starbucks on college road in Henderson

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A cafe mocha, the grande one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that a hot or cold beverage?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's a hot beverage

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any extras? Like whipped cream or espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No espresso, but whipped would be great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I'll go ahead and order that drink for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, what kind of milk did you want? There are five types if I'm not mistaken

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll just have the milk that it comes with, nothing fancy

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just regular milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, 2%

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll order the drink for you now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the coffee thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, Iwent ahead and ordered that drink for you, a grande cafe mocha with whipped cream and 2% milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much for you help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, it'll be ready in about fifteen minutes!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sent the receipt to your phone!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, have a great day, bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye!
